txt.en: Thavronwë, a statue-carver currently at Cerin Amroth in search of inspiration, would like you to help him add to a stockpile of stone and wood for him and his fellow carvers.

'Hello again, [placeholder]. Are you here to gather more raw materials for me? Thanks in part to you, these formless hunks of stone and wood will take on lovingly-carved forms to grace the homes of the Galadhrim for Ages to come.\n\n'Do you remember where to find everything? Curve around to the east of the low cliff of white, chalk-bearing rock; from there, you can go due north-east and up the slope to find birch-wood in and around the grove. To find the stone outcroppings, head due east into Gelirdor, then head south-east when you reach the first clearing.'
There is a high concentration of birch north-east of Cerin Amroth. Stone is east, in a clearing carpeted in yellow flowers, in Gelirdor.\n\nThavronwë has asked that you gather stone and wood for him.
'Welcome back! Thank you kindly, friend [placeholder]; any time you wish to help me again, it would be most welcome.\n\n'As for my next effort...the sketches are coming along nicely!'
Thavronwë is atop the flet in Cerin Amroth.\n\nYou should return to Thavronwë and give him the raw materials you fetched for him.
'Could you bring me the stone and wood that I requested?'
